welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hawthorne, where the charm of a small town meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for its historic charm and vibrant cultural scene, we invite you to explore our streets, enjoy our local cuisine, and make lasting memories in our beautiful city.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The main international terminal at LAX, serving over 30 airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at LAX, serving Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving international and domestic flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for Delta Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines and select international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Whiteman Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Alaska Airlines and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as Southwest Airlines and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
